venue.name: Meet Outside Cheers - Brunch at Beacon Hill Bistro

item.description:
We are co-hosting another fun Singles Sunday walk & brunch with the Post Club.
So if you are SINGLE & GENUINELY AVAILABLE & LOOKING!, come on down and join the group. A little fresh air and some exercise and/or checking out some cute tall singles will definitely raise your heart rate nicely....

We will meet outside Cheers (which is inside the Hampshire House) ON THE STREET @ 11.30am - this is an easy spot to find, therefore a good place for us to meet up to begin the Walk. But we won't do brunch there, too many tourists...:).

We'll walk around Beacon Hill for 45 minutes or so, ending with brunch at Beacon Hill Bistro on Charles Street.
We'll have a pre-planned route (thanks to bostonwalk.org) and you'll be given your own copy of the map and route notes for future use.

Brunch will be at 1 pm (for those that want to skip the walk & head straight for the food & mimosas...!).
After brunch - optional extra = torture your credit card on Newbury Street. :)

**** PLEASE NOTE!! PLEASE NOTE!! ****
**** RSVP is mandatory for this event ****
**** This is so that we can reserve the right-sized table for brunch & have enough maps to hand out ****

You can RSVP Maybe initially, but you will need to commit to either a Yes or a No the day before the event (4/26)

Cost of the walk is free; you are responsible for paying for your own brunch.
For more info on the Beacon Hill Bistro and to view their menus, go to Beacon Hill Hotel & Bistro
item.why: Cute, cultured, tall singles will be there; and the brunch is fantastic too!
item.name: Beacon Hill Brownstone Meander & Brunch
